title: EP 30: Failures and Lessons Learned
itunes:title: EP 30: Failures and Lessons Learned
description:
In this episode of The Tactical Entrepreneur podcast, Steve talks about the mistakes he made, the lessons he learned from those mistakes so that you could try to avoid them.

 

What You Will Learn:

  • Why do you need to know your numbers?
  • Make sure you know what's working and what's not working.
  • Trusting is good, but verify.
  • Remember to plan for growth.
  • Avoid trying to do too many things at once.
  • Try to use your customer's perception and keep an open mind.

 

“Know your numbers. Not just at tax time, not just at quarterly meetings. Know them, at least on a weekly basis.”

   - Steve Schabacker

 

How To Get Involved:

Steve Schabacker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.

Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
